titleInfo.title: Capitol Airways flight to California, circa 1960s

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: An unidentified woman on board a Capitol Airways flight to California, circa 1960s. Several persons on that trip were wearing buttons that read: “Litton Rand Official.” Capitol Airways was founded in 1946 and ended operations in 1982. The airline was also known as Capitol International Airways. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 35 mm slide, filmstrip : b & w.

titleInfo.title: Record Group 3 Metro Davidson County Photographer
